title: Oyster shell powder-loaded cellulose gel beads as a high-efficiency adsorbent for phosphorus recovery: preparation, kinetics, isotherms and thermodynamic studies

Pingguo Wu, Jiyan Zhong, Naisi Liang, Chanyan Li, Qingyue Cao, Mingjuan Zhao, Yong Li, Mingneng Liao, Chuanming Yu
A cellulose-based monolithic gel on which oyster shell powder is immobilized, resulting in a green bead (OSP@Gel) capable of efficiently recovering phosphate from water.
